jcr:content.jcr:description: Pigment Solution™ Program lightens dark spots, liver spots and evens out skin tone to reveal a more radiant you.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Pigment Solution™ Program

title_copy_copy_copy.jcr:title: Find your way back to an even skin tone with our Pigment Solution™ Program

text.text:
Many factors including sun damage, some medications and hormonal changes can cause acute hyperpigmentation of the skin characterised by brown or blue-gray patches or freckle-like spots.

There are many other types of hyperpigmentation, some can be uncomfortable, and many negatively affect our self esteem. 

Pigment Solution™ Program can literally lighten the load; Lightning dark spots, liver spots, evening skin tone and revealing a more radiant you.

duplabanner_teaser.jcr:description:
THIS 3 STEPS PROGRAMME HAS BEEN CLINICALLY PROVEN* EFFECTIVE TO

Reduce dark spots and different types of hyperpigmentation: epidermal,  dermal, and mixed.  
Improve results in combination with chemical peels
Reduce chances of post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation after laser treatments

A safe, easy, at home treatment that you find enlightening and enhancing.

 

*Test performed on 33 patients with pigmentation spots on face and hands who applied each of the two products (day and night creams) once a day (morning and evening) for 30 days. Two self-assessment questionnaires were administered during the one at the beginning and one at the end of the treatment after 30 days.
duplabanner_teaser.jcr:title: THE 3 STEP PROGRAMME

item_1723188422005.cq:panelTitle: What is a Pigment Solution™ Program?

text_copy_copy.text: This treatment program is made up of 3 simple parts - a daily cleanser, a day cream and a night cream - so it fits easily into your skincare routine. You will notice a gradual reduction in unwanted pigmentation in just 28 days.

item_1723188426365.cq:panelTitle: What is our Pigment Solution™ Program good for?

text_copy_copy.text:
Pigmentation due to UV damage, hormonal influences, pharmacological reactions, inflammation or simply genetics can be treated. 

Most pigment treatments only inhibit further melanin production, whereas our Pigment Solution™ Program performs a double peeling effect  by mechanically and chemically exfoliating the skin, while simultaneously nourishing it, to reveal fresh untainted layers of fresh, even toned skin.

item_1723188294817.cq:panelTitle: What is a Pigment Solution™ Program treatment like?

text_copy_copy.text: Simply ‘cleanse and apply’ creams for non invasive, gentle yet clinically proven, gradual at home daily use. Make up can be applied directly after use as normal.

item_1725441818819.cq:panelTitle: How does Pigment Solution™ Program work?

text.text:
The cleanser soothes and prepares the skin for treatment

The day cream harnesses the power of multiple nourishing, protective and regenerating ingredients:

  • Vitamin A restores suppleness and enhances the appearance of dull skin

  • Kojic Acid then performs a lightning action with a mild chemical exfoliation

  • Aquaxyl™ (an combination of glucose and xylitol molecules, able to capture and retain free water), moisturises and restructures the skin, protecting it from external agents and reducing moisture loss

  • Vitamin E protects the skin by acting as a free-radical scavenger (experimental studies suggest that vitamin E has photoprotective properties11)

The night cream performs a more efficacious exfoliation to even out pigmentation on the skin’s surface while you sleep with a combination of chemical and mechanical peel actions thanks to Kojic Acid, Glycolic Acid, and Biodegradable scrubbing beads.

title.jcr:title: Trusted to work with you skin, not against it

text.text:
Many over the counter lightening treatments are associated with potential skin damage and side effects, or, only prevent the further production of Melanin and are ineffective at actual pigment reduction. 

 

Pigment Solution™ Program has been clinically proven to be effective and safe for pigment reduction in both solo usage and in combination with other non topical treatments15,17

 

such as chemical peels and laser treatments. 

When used alone, Pigment Solution™ program has been proven in clinical studies to reduce pigmentation by 14% after just 28 days, 34% after 45 days and 64% after 90 days.14,15

It’s simple. It’s effective. It fits into your routine.

title_1111695653.jcr:title: A complete skin care range for reduction of hyperpigmentation

text_copy_copy.text: Hyperpigmentation is the appearance of dark, blue/grey or brown spots on the skin
Many factors including sun damage, some medications and hormonal changes can cause acute hyperpigmentation of the skin characterised by brown or blue-gray patches or freckle-like spots.

item_1723188294817.cq:panelTitle: How do I get rid of hyperpigmentation?

text_copy_copy.text: Most pigment treatments only inhibit further melanin production, whereas our Pigment Solution™ Programme mechanically and chemically exfoliates the skin, while simultaneously nourishing it, to reveal fresh untainted layers of fresh, even toned skin.

text.text:
11.Keen M.A. and Hassan I. Vitamin E in dermatology. Indian Dermatol Online J. 2016 Jul-Aug; 7(4): 311–315

14.. Berardesca E, Rigoni C, Cantù A, Cameli N, Tedeschi A; Donne Dermatologhe Italia, Laureti T. Effectiveness of a new cosmetic treatment for melasma.

    J Cosmet Dermatol. 2020 Jul;19(7):1684-1690. doi: 10.1111/jocd.13203. Epub 2019 Nov 20. PMID: 31746537 

15.Berardesca E. et al “Valutazione clinica e strumentale sull’efficacia di una nuova formulazione depigmentante” Dermakos. Nov 2017: 51-53 

17.Wong V. Resurface, Retone and Reboost: A Multi-Modality Approach for Prejuvenation of Millennial Patients. J Clin Exp Dermatol Res, Vol.12 Iss.S8 No:549.
